price: Hakika wale walio kufuru hazitawafaa kitu mali zao wala watoto wao mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu. Na hao ndio watu wa Motoni - humo watadumu.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: Wale walio kufuru, mali yao na wangayatoa kuwa ni fidia hayatowafaa kitu, wala watoto wao na wangawataka msaada hawatoweza kuwasaidia hata chembe kuwakinga na adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu katika Akhera. Na hawa ndio walio lazimika kuingia Motoni na waselelee humo.(wadumu)

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum mina al-lahi shayan wa-ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
